text: wlkl jamaeat muwminat slft, jaealna laha manasik min aldhbh w'iraqt aldma'; wdhlk liyadhkuruu asm allah taealaa eind dhubih ma razaqahum min hadhih al'aneam wyshkru lh. f'ilhkm -ayha alnas- 'ilh wahid hu allah fanqadu lamrh wamur rswlh. wbshshir - 'ayuha alnby- almtwadeyn alkhadeyn lirabihim bkhyray aldunya walakhrt
